Author: Poins Representative
Title: [ANN] - ICO Sale (Active NOW) - Poins Platform ⭐⭐⭐ Three Platform One Coin! ⭐⭐⭐
Body: ANNOUNCEMENT  We have come to the decision that it is not possible, nor viable to pursue a POINS project.  The crypto markets being still down has caused ICO to weaken, and we have not received enough funds from investors. This means we would have very slim chances of succeeding.  All funds from the investors that have been paid, will be returned according to what they paid in advance. The refund procedure will be carried out as soon as possible after this announcement is broadcast. And there will be a further announcement regarding the refund.  The POINS project will thus end its journey.  We are sad that the POINS Project will not come to reality, and want to thank all of you who have supported us; the team members, group admins and our community.  Thank you all

Title: [ANN] - ICO Sale (Active NOW) - Poins Platform ⭐⭐⭐ Three Platform One Coin! ⭐⭐⭐
Body: Hi DEV-Guidemine,  We do not prefer imagining things, therefore, we do not prefer taking RANDOM names of top ICO listing exchanges for sake of looking good. We are working out on this aspect very careful and closely. As we know, it is irrelevant how good a project is or how good the concept is, IF the project does not get PROPER listing in right time then all become meaningless! The day Poins was planned, that very day, it was all about cracking the listing mystery. And only after we figured out how it is going to be, you see something called "Poins" LIVE!  So, we assure you that we are NOT going to put our investors into trauma of waiting! As not only we have PLANS for each and everything, but we have PLANS for each and every situation! Author: Poins Representative
Title: [ANN] - ICO Sale (Active NOW) - Poins Platform ⭐⭐⭐ Three Platform One Coin! ⭐⭐⭐
Body: ANNOUNCEMENT  We have come to the decision that it is not possible, nor viable to pursue a POINS project.  The crypto markets being still down has caused ICO to weaken, and we have not received enough funds from investors. This means we would have very slim chances of succeeding.  All funds from the investors that have been paid, will be returned according to what they paid in advance. The refund procedure will be carried out as soon as possible after this announcement is broadcast. And there will be a further announcement regarding the refund.  The POINS project will thus end its journey.  We are sad that the POINS Project will not come to reality, and want to thank all of you who have supported us; the team members, group admins and our community.  You can request for refund your eth/btc through Request Form on the website: poins.io if you have any questions, please contact us at: support@poins.io  Thank you all
